titles.title: The Marriage Of The Lamb Is Come

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Rejoice, rejoice, for the marriage is come at last!
Rejoice, rejoice, and be exceedingly glad,
And shout the victory
Of joy eternally
Of love unknown before on the earth.
The marriage of the Lamb is come.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lo, winter is past and the rain is o'er and gone,
And the flowers appear on the earth,
And the time of the singing of the birds is come,
And the voice of the dove is heard.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As the Bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride.
So shall thy God rejoice over thee.
And oh, oh the joy when the manchild at last
Shall bring in the year of Jubilee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then the love of the Father is not in him.
For the cravings of this sinful man,
The lust, the pride within,
Cometh not from the Father, but from sin
And darkness of this world.
So He calls His people out to live
Holy by His word.
